knimeNode.name: Random Forest Nearest Neighbors
knimeNode.shortDescription: Determines the nearest neighbors in the second table for each row in the first table based on the proximity induced by an ensemble of trees.

intro.p: Finds and returns the k nearest neighbors in the second table for each row in the first table based on the proximity measure induced by an ensemble of trees.
The proximity of two data points is the number of times that the points end up in the same leaf node of a tree in a forest of trees divided by the number of trees in the forest.

ports.outPort: A table containing the nearest neighbors in the second table for each row in the first table
A table containing the proximity values for the nearest neighbors
